title: Long Xian Ying Luo Ji Shi Gui
overview: After a deadly war, Dragon Clan heir Long Xian and celestial war goddess Ying Luo perish, only for Long Xian to be reborn 10,000 years later. To regain control, the Celestial Lord sends the revived Ying Luo to subdue him, but Long Xian wins her over with sincerity instead of force. As love emerges amid power struggles, betrayal leads to tragedy, leaving Ying Luo to wait for eternity, hoping to reunite with her lost love.
